articles.title: Woman teaches pups to pray before eating meal, sweet video will brighten your day - The Indian Express
articles.description: While the woman is seen devotedly chanting some mantras, the two dogs are seen patiently trying to wait till the prayer ends.
articles.content: Amid all the distressing content on social media, people are looking for some respite to keep up their fight against Covid-19. Now, a sweet video of two dogs learning to pray before they enjoy their … [+2008 chars]
